trans-unit.source: Enumerates values for the state of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Räknar upp värdena för tillståndet för den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.State%2A> property uses SynthesizerState to indicate the current state of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.State%2A>Egenskapen använder SynthesizerState för att ange det aktuella tillståndet för <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.PreviousState%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A> properties use SynthesizerState to indicate state of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> when the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.PreviousState%2A>och <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A>Egenskaper använder SynthesizerState för att visa status på <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>när den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>händelsen utlöses.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.PreviousState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> is ready to generate speech from a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Anger att den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> är redo att generera tal från en kommandotolk.
